# CNContactPhoneticOrganizationNameKey

**Global Variable**

The phonetic spelling of the contact’s organization name.

## Declaration

```swift
let CNContactPhoneticOrganizationNameKey: String
```

## Work

- **CNContactJobTitleKey**: The contact’s job title.
- **CNContactDepartmentNameKey**: The contact’s department name.
- **CNContactOrganizationNameKey**: The contact’s organization name.
title: CNContactPhoneticOrganizationNameKey
